entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:24 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -38.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 1:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -38.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -58
Dewpoint: -42.2°C
Wind: WNW 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 35.
